review: This was a gift and I love it. Great video quality when wired to my network. Recently however it no longer works with Netflix.  Have seen a few other reviews with the same complaint.  Amazon video and Prime selections are good no complaint there. Not every service has all the movies you would ever want but the combination of Amazon TV (w/Prime), Netflix and the cable pay per view gets you almost everything.  Running Netflix through the DVD player until Amazon fixes the connection issues.  It's a shame bcs I assume Amazon is loosing money as Netflix users go to other devices (like me).  Having Netflix on Fire TV brings buyers to Amazon, Netflix not working on Fire makes them go elsewhere.The voice search is GREAT by the way.
author: DavidK
